name: Angular-form-validation
body:
# angular-form-validation ##### This plugin can be used to show validation message. # Directives * `form-validation` : This can be used with form tag. It initiates the form validations and show the validation messages on form submit if validation fails * `validation-message` : This can be used to register a field with validation and validation message/code * `form-error` : This can be used to show validation message, act as a placeholder in DOM, can be placed inside form or outside form. # Usage * _HTML_ ```html
``` * _Code_ ```javascript angular.module('testApp',['formValidation']); ```
